name: gp-devices-at-risk-widget
description: it is designed to get a list of devices based on a group selection and display any device that has a Critical/Major Alarm or Medium/High-Risk Firmware raised against it.
author: Sabreen Irfana - Software AG, Global Presales

scripts.buildPatch: cd projects/gp-devices-at-risk-widget && npm version patch && ng build gp-devices-at-risk-widget && cd ../../dist/gp-devices-at-risk-widget && npm pack && move *.tgz ../
scripts.buildMinor: cd projects/gp-devices-at-risk-widget && npm version minor && ng build gp-devices-at-risk-widget && cd ../../dist/gp-devices-at-risk-widget && npm pack && move *.tgz ../
scripts.buildMajor: cd projects/gp-devices-at-risk-widget && npm version major && ng build gp-devices-at-risk-widget && cd ../../dist/gp-devices-at-risk-widget && npm pack && move *.tgz ../
scripts.serve: ng build gp-devices-at-risk-widget && npm i dist/gp-devices-at-risk-widget && ng s
